name: Time Janitor (littlesparta)
description:
A time travelling game made by four friends for Epic's Megajam 2020.

Play as an agent whose mission is to travel across timelines on alien planets to clean up temporal rifts causing havoc in the universe. With your standard issue time manipulator, switch between timelines to get to that troublesome temporal rift and seal it. 

The Bureau expects you home for tea. On time.
